version_description:
． Upload settings are now available offline (to adjust parameters of the Geofences)
． It's now possible to upload from your Photo Stream
． Corrected the layout in the Geofence setup on iPhone 6+
． Fixed an issue applying actions to filtered photos under "Shared Albums"
． Fixed a crashing issue when a portfolio was set as the home view but hidden to a non-admin account
． Fixed an issue where saved images would be downsized even though "Original quality" was selected
． Minor bug fixes

． It's now possible to view photos/videos directly on a Chromecast/DLNA TV
． Videos unsupported natively by iOS can now be played via DS file 5.2+ or other third party players
． Added a date picker to the Timeline to easily navigate to a specific date
． Fixed a bug preventing the upload in original quality of certain photos
． Minor bug fixes and usability enhancements

． When sending photos to a Chromecast, the name and location are now displayed
． Geofences can now be set up directly with a map
． Improved the battery usage of Geofences
． Slow-motion and time-lapsed videos can now be uploaded
． Improved the compatibility with certain DLNA TVs
． Improved the certificate verification process to detect any updates on the DiskStation
． Sharing and downloading options are now systematically displayed using admin, other accounts follow the Photo Station settings
． Minor bug fixes and usability enhancements

． 64-bit support for better performances
． DS photo can now perform background uploads periodically (frequency defined arbitrarily by the iOS system), without the need to set up Geofences
． Fixed an issue where photos may be uploaded twice
． Addresses certain issues when uploading photos / large videos
． Minor bug fixes and usability enhancements

． Fixed an issue where DS photo might crash in the following scenarios:
- upon launch
- when users continuously switch between albums and photos
- upon streaming images via AirPlay
． Minor bug fixes

・Users can now customize photo quality when sharing to other applications
・Added support of animated GIF format
・Enhanced performance of QuickConnect
・Fixed an issue where the app may be disconnected from Chromecast when an album contains over a certain amount of photos
・Fixed an issue where the app may suddenly quit during photo backup
・Fixed an issue where the app may fail to play videos when logged in using HTTPS
・Minor bug fixes

． Fixed an issue where DS photo may crash unexpectedly upon launch after the latest update
． Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where the app may quit unexpectedly when using QuickConnect ID as backup destination
．Minor bug fixes

．Enhanced operation flow when photo backup settings change
．Fixed an issue where the upload of 4K videos may not complete properly, or may degrade the quality
．Fixed an issue where the specific album may not be uploaded properly when containing photos/videos imported from SD card reader
．Minor bug fixes

．Extended the upload file size limitation from 2GB to 32GB for 64-bit models
．Added support of upload/backup function for Live Photo taken with iPhone 6s/6s+
．Fixed an issue where the app may become unresponsive if a user slides photos when connected via DLNA to a Samsung TV
．Fixed an issue where the app may quit unexpectedly when uploading files
．Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where the app may quit unexpectedly when launched or operating photo backup
．Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where the app may crash unexpectedly when launched or connected via HTTPS protocol
．Fixed an issue where uploads of edited photos may fail on devices running iOS 9
．Fixed an issue where uploads/backup of Live Photos with videos may not work properly
．Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where the app may quit unexpectedly when launched
．Minor bug fixes

．Photo rating is now available with Photo Station 6.5.0 and above
．Users can now edit album covers in smart/downloaded/general albums
．Users can now back up photos stored on iCloud
．Added support for sharing videos/photos from other apps to DS photo
．Fixed an issue where auto-login function may fail
．Fixed an issue where abnormal characters may appear after the modification of photo's description
．Minor bug fixes

- Fixed an issue where the app might quit unexpectedly when uploading or backing up photos
- Minor bug fixes

．You can now select an album and share it publicly. All items immediately below this album will be shared except for sub-albums (Photo Station 6.6.0 or above required)
．Added support for unlocking the app with a passcode or Touch ID
．Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where videos could not be played via HTTPS connections
．Fixed an issue where the app might freeze when switching to the map mode with large amounts of photos being uploaded
．Minor bug fixes

．Supports viewing and editing information of albums at all levels
．Preserves the slow-motion effect in uploaded videos
．Preserves the filters and special effects in uploaded Live Photos (iOS 10 or above required)
．Fixed an issue where photo backup might be triggered by VPN connection over 3G network even when the "Upload on Wi-Fi only" option was selected
．Minor bug fixes
．Added format compatibility on iOS 11 by converting HEIF images to JPEGs during photo backup or uploads

．Added compatibility with iPhone X
．Fixed an issue where uploading photos applied with filters or effects might cause the photos to be renamed with filename beginning with "FullSizeRender"
．Fixed an issue where the "Photo backup completed" status might be displayed even when backup tasks are still in progress
．Minor bug fixes

- Supports user interface in Thai language
- Optimized display on the new iPad Pro and iPhone XR
- Fixed an issue where sharing photos to DS photo from Facebook Messenger might fail
- Fixed an issue where the home indicator wasn’t hidden when users browse photos in full screen
- Fixed an issue where login to DS photo via HTTPS might fail
- Fixed an issue where star ratings might disappear
- Minor bug fixes
- Added support for iPhone XS Max UI layout
．Fixed an issue where photo backup might be suspended due to incorrect permission denial
．Fixed an issue where adding geofence in photo backup settings might fail
- Updated Synology's terms and conditions for EU data privacy compliance
- Added support for iPhone XS Max UI layout

- Supports user interface in Thai language
- Optimized display on the new iPad Pro and iPhone XR
- Fixed an issue where sharing photos to DS photo from Facebook Messenger might fail
- Fixed an issue where the home indicator wasn’t hidden when users browse photos in full screen
- Fixed an issue where login to DS photo via HTTPS might fail
- Fixed an issue where star ratings might disappear
- Minor bug fixes
